name: Shoes Ordering Website
desc: A Shoes ordering Website implemented using Java,Html,CSS,JSP,JDBC and MYSQL.

name: Daily Lecture Record
desc: The Daily Lecture Record System (DLRS) is designed to streamline the process of recording, tracking, and analyzing lecture activities.

name: Hospital Management System
desc: The Hospital Management System is a software application designed to facilitate the efficient management of hospital operations, patient records, and prescriptions.

name: Company Network System
desc: The primary objective was to establish a scalable, reliable, and secure network infrastructure to support the operational needs of 600 staff across various departments.
